steps.title: Background
steps.description:
You know how sometimes you wait in line for half an hour, and you look at the time and less than 10 minutes have gone by?

or your starving waiting for your meal, about to snap at the poor waiter for torturing you for so long, only to realize just a few minutes have passed?

on the other hand, when your having fun with that special friend, or see a great movie, it seems like hours turn to minutes, and "where did the time ago???"

That happens all the time, and the ability to control time at the time you wish is a good recipe to turn bad time to good time, and turn good time to something so wonderful you might have not experienced yet.

Now before we get you into some wacky states, you might wonder ...

answers.text: how is it going to work Adam?

steps.title: How is it going to work
steps.description:
I'm glad you asked,
so here's how it's going to work,
as I've been studying human behavior, organisms,
how society shapes behavior, communication,
and the greatest learning machine of all, the human brain,
I'm going to give you some things to try,
and whatever works for you, you get to keep,
whatever doesn't you file away in the
"thing's I've tried and haven't worked for me yet."

Sounds good?

answers.text: Sounds great, let's do this Adam!

steps.title: Recurring situation - category
steps.description:
pick a recurring situation you have trouble dealing with,

i.e. going to the bank, dealing with a certain person, etc

steps.title: Recurring situation - specific example
steps.description:
And ${echo} ...

Now pick a specific example or a future scenario of that recurring situation
steps.notes: E.g. if the category is standing in line for the bank, pick a a specific scenario of you standing in line for the bank, or talking to the teller, etc

steps.title: Normal time
steps.description:
${echo}

Run that scenario in your mind in normal time, just as you usually think about it

answers.text: I ran the scenario in normal time, what's next?

steps.title: Normal time - report
steps.description:
how was it to run the scenario "normally"?

how it feels like?

and how intense is the feeling?
steps.inputPlaceholder: When I run the scenario in normal time I feel ...

steps.title: Fast time
steps.description:
Now go back to the beginning of the scenario, freeze the frame, step inside the beginning of the scenario,

and hear and feel turning down a knob and slow YOURSELF to half speed,

so everything will be running twice as fast in your subjective experience, and go through the scenario in fast time,

i.e. every one in the bank will talk and move twice as fast as you

answers.text: I ran the scenario in fast time, what's next?
Running it in fast time is trippy!

steps.title: Fast time - report
steps.description:
${echo}

How was it to run the scenario in "fast time"?

How does it feel like?

And how intense is the feeling?
steps.inputPlaceholder: When I run the scenario in fast time I feel ...

steps.title: Slow time
steps.description:
go back to the beginning of the scenario, freeze the frame, step inside the beginning of the scenario,

hear and feel turning up a knob and speed YOURSELF back to normal speed,

then turn the knob further up and speed YOURSELF to double speed,

so everything will be running twice as slow in your subjective experience, and go through the scenario in slow time

i.e. every one in the bank will talk and move twice as slow as you

answers.text: I ran the scenario in slow time, what's next?
Running it in slow time is trippy!

steps.title: Normal time - noticing differences
steps.description: Now try and run the same scenario in normal time, and try to get the old feeling back, and notice what's different.

steps.title: My own experience (Adam)
steps.description:
Isn't it freaky?

for me it changed from negative to "c'mon out with it! let's get it over with!"

sort of a comical impatience :)

steps.title: Intensifying good times
steps.description:
${echo}

We can repeat this process with an experience you enjoy, to intensify the good feelings.

 if you wish. repeat the entire process for a recurring PLEASURABLE situation, in which you wish to amplify and experience that much more INTENSE pleasure in a deep way.

(this is some trippy stuff ...)

I went for juggling and sex, not necessarily in that order ;)

When your ready, repeat the process, and replace "trouble" with "pleasurable" as you come along, and thrust forward inside ...

answers.text: Naa, let's skip intensifying pleasure for now
